articles.title: Senate approves bill to end the shutdown, sending it to the House
articles.description:
Five moderate Democrats switched their votes as federal food aid was delayed, airport delays worsened, and hundreds of thousands of federal workers continued to go unpaid.

The post Senate approves bill to end the shutdown, sending it to the House appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Senate approved a bill to end the federal shutdown on November 10, 2025.
Five moderate Democrats changed their votes amid worsening airport delays and food aid issues.
Hundreds of thousands of federal workers, including many in Boston, remain unpaid during the shutdown.

articles.title: Zdeno Chara’s 10 most memorable moments with the Bruins
articles.description:
Chara served as captain of the Bruins for 14 seasons.

The post Zdeno Chara’s 10 most memorable moments with the Bruins appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Zdeno Chara captained the Bruins for 14 seasons, shaping team culture.
Chara's leadership contributed to the Bruins' 2011 Stanley Cup victory.
His memorable moments resonate with Boston fans, enhancing local sports pride.
